author: IGN
description:
IGN’s Seth Macy reunites with his NVC host successor, Logan Plant, to check out some of the coolest demos at PAX West 2025 in Seattle! From huge games like Pokémon Legends: Z-A, Elden Ring: Tarnished Edition, Final Fantasy 7 on the Nintendo Switch 2, STARSEEKER: Astroneer Expeditions from Devolver Digital, Fractured Blooms from Serenity Forge, to up-and-coming 8-bit console GameTank. Let’s check 'em out!
Presented by the Army National Guard.

#IGN #gaming
title: Pokémon Legends: Z-A, Fractured Blooms, Elden Ring: Tarnished Edition, And More Awesome Games | PAX

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Official Trailer for John Candy: I Like Me, a new documentary film distributed by Amazon Prime Video. Viewers can explore the life of the Canadian comedic icon John Candy when John Candy: I Like Me streams on October 10 exclusively on Amazon Prime Video.

This John Candy film documents his on- and off-camera existence, featuring never-before-seen home videos, intimate access to his family, and candid recollections from collaborators to paint a bigger picture of one of the brightest stars of the ’70s, ’80s, and ’90s. It’s the story of a son, husband, father, friend, and professional driven to bring joy to audiences and loved ones while battling personal ghosts and Hollywood pressures. 

John Candy: I Like Me stars Tom Hanks, Bill Murray, Steve Martin, Conan O'Brien, and more. The documentary is directed by Colin Hanks. 

John Candy: I Like Me streams on October 10 exclusively on Amazon Prime Video.
title: John Candy: I Like Me - Official Trailer (2025) Documentary

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Alloyed Collective Operator Survivor Reveal Trailer for Risk of Rain 2, the hit third-person action platformer roguelike developed by Hopoo Games. Players will soon be able to access the new Survivor being added to the game, called Operator. Operator makes use of their abilities to enhance their own combat skills, making them an agile powerhouse on the battlefield. Operator is coming soon to Risk of Rain 2 for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, and PC (Steam and Epic Games Store).

#IGN #gaming
title: Risk of Rain 2 - Official Alloyed Collective Operator Survivor Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description: Get your first look at Snatch Squad, an open-world co-op heist game with a voxel look that aims to mix GTA Vice City with PayDay. Build your empire by pulling off successful heists, taking over districts of the city, and laundering money. Wishlist Snatch Squad on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3465810/Snatch_Squad/
title: Snatch Squad - Official Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Teaser Trailer for A Very Jonas Christmas Movie, a comedic Christmas musical distributed by Walt Disney Pictures. Join The Jonas Brothers on an endearing film about the spirit of Christmas. A Very Jonas Christmas is streaming on November 14 on Disney+.

Three famous brothers race against time and face mounting challenges during a chaotic journey from London to New York, desperate to make it home in time for Christmas with their loved ones.

A Very Jonas Christmas Movie stars Kevin Jonas, Joe Jonas, Nick Jonas, Chloe Bennet, Randall Park, and more. The film is directed by Jessica Yu and written by Isaac Aptaker and Elizabeth Berger. 

A Very Jonas Christmas is streaming on November 14 on Disney+.
title: A Very Jonas Christmas Movie - Official Teaser Trailer (2025) Jonas Brothers

author: IGN
description: Welcome to the festival of explosive races, TRAIL OUT! Check out the latest Trail Out trailer for this vehicular combat racing game to see what to expect with the Tokyo Breach update, featuring new maps, new modes, and an updated career mode. The Trail Out: Tokyo Breach trailer showcases gameplay with fast races and destruction. Trail Out features reckless racing around the world, along with crashes, explosions, destruction, and screaming drivers. The Trail Out: Tokyo Breach update is available now on Steam and Xbox.
title: Trail Out: Tokyo Breach - Official Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Launch Week Trailer for Borderlands 4, the next installment in the first-person looter shooter franchise developed by Gearbox. The legendary game franchise continues its lineage by taking Vault Hunters to Kairos to put an end to the Timekeeper's plans by making use of powerful abilities, new traversal mechanics, and plenty of guns. Borderlands 4 is launching on September 12 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam), with the Nintendo Switch 2 release on October 3.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Borderlands 4 - Official Launch Week Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Launch Trailer for Tokyo Underground Killer, a first-person melee-based action game developed by Phoenix Game Productions. 

Players will fight through the neon streets of Tokyo as Kobayashi, a deadly assassin on a mission to stop an invasion of the city. Make use of mystical abilities by absorbing energy from blood, slicing and dicing enemies with a brutal sword, and acquiring upgrades to grow in power. Tokyo Underground Killer is available now for PC (Steam).

#IGN #TokyoUndergroundKiller #FirstPerson
title: Tokyo Underground Killer - Official Launch Trailer (English Subtitles)

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Gameplay Overview Trailer for Dragon Quest 1&2 HD-2D Remake, a remake of the classic RPG developed by Square Enix. 

Players can get the rundown on the game's exploration, combat, party lineup, and more with the latest gameplay overview. Dragon Quest 1&2 HD-2D Remake is launching on October 30 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, Nintendo Switch 2, and PC (Steam).

#IGN #DragonQuest #SquareEnix
title: Dragon Quest 1&2 HD-2D Remake - Official Gameplay Overview Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Now that Star Wars Outlaws is on the Switch 2, we figured its appropriate to compare the graphics between the PC and Portable versions of the game. 

The Siwtch 2 version runs at 1080p while docked and 720p while in handheld mode with a target framerate of 30fps. It looks ok, but can definitley get dark in some areas. Let us know what you think! 

Gameplay captured on a PC with an RTX 5090 GPU and a Docked Nintendo Switch 2.
title: Star Wars Outlaws - Nintendo Switch 2 & PC Graphics Comparison

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Special Bonus Rewards Trailer for Death Stranding 2: On the Beach, the latest installment in the action-adventure management walking simulation strand game developed by Kojima Productions. 

As players embark on their journey across Australia, players can encounter the VTuber Usada Pekora and by completing deliveries for her, a special reward will be available. Eliminate Armed Survivalists in Peko style in Death Stranding 2: On the Beach, available now for PlayStation 5 (PS5).

#IGN #DeathStranding2 #Kojima
title: Death Stranding 2: On the Beach - Official Special Bonus Rewards Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Nintendo Switch 2 Launch Trailer for Cronos: The New Dawn, the third-person action survival horror game developed by Bloober Team. 

Embark on a journey as The Traveler sent through time to investigate a mystery that echoes through the ages. Dispatch monstrosities, solve environmental puzzles, and attain upgrades to grow stronger along the way. Cronos: The New Dawn is available now for Nintendo Switch 2 alongside PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC.

#IGN #CronosTheNewDawn #Switch2
title: Cronos: The New Dawn - Official Nintendo Switch 2 Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Advent Children EC Edition Teaser Trailer for Final Fantasy 7 Ever Crisis, a mobile episodic version of the hit Final Fantasy 7 developed by Applibot and Square Enix. 

Players can soon experience Final Fantasy 7: Advent Children content in Final Fantasy 7 Ever Crisis. The Advent Children EC Edition for Final Fantasy 7 Ever Crisis is launching on September 6 for iOS, Android, and PC.

#IGN #FinalFantasy7 #FFEvercrisis
title: Final Fantasy 7 Ever Crisis - Official Advent Children EC Edition Teaser Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the 'A Global Campaign' Feature Trailer for Jurassic World Evolution 3, a dinosaur park management simulation game developed by Frontier Developments. 

While players will have much to consider in terms of managing the dinosaurs, the global field of parks will also be the players' responsibility to help maintain and grow. Build and rebuild parks, unlock new locations, dinosaurs, and more to balance competing priorities of Security, Entertainment, and Conservation to aid in the vision. Learn more with the latest trailer for Jurassic World Evolution 3, launching on October 21 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam and Epic Games Store).

#IGN #JurassicWorld #JurassicPark
title: Jurassic World Evolution 3 - Official 'A Global Campaign' Feature Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Enhanced Opening Movie for Final Fantasy Tactics: The Ivalice Chronicles, a remake of the hit strategy tactical RPG developed by Square Enix Creative Business Unit 3. 

Players will experience the deep narrative of Ramza Beoulve, an aspiring knight of noble birth, and his companions who are thrust into a journey of honor, betrayal, and sacrifice that will shape the future of the kingdom of Ivalice. Final Fantasy Tactics: The Ivalice Chronicles is launching on September 30 for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, Nintendo Switch 2, and PC.

#IGN #FinalFantasy #SquareEnix
title: Final Fantasy Tactics: The Ivalice Chronicles - Official Enhanced Opening Movie

author: IGN
description:
In this clip from Nintendo Voice Chat, we react to the long-anticipated release of Hollow Knight: Silksong. Join the NVC crew as they share their first impressions, discuss how it compares to the original Hollow Knight, and break down what could be next for the future of the franchise.
#Silksong #Nintendo #gaming
title: Silksong Is Out Now - NVC Clips

author: IGN
description:
Welcome back to Next-Gen Console Watch! This week Daemon, Max, and Ryan discuss the latest PlayStation 6 rumors, which predict Sony's next gaming hardware to be a handheld like the Switch 2. Nintendo's Switch changed the gaming landscape, ushering in a wave of handheld competitors like the Valve Steam Deck, ROG Ally, and more. Now with Xbox officially jumping into the ring with the ROG Xbox Ally X, is it time for Sony to follow suit? No, the PlayStation Portal doesn't count. And what would benefit them more, a dedicated handheld like the PS Vita, or a hybrid with a dock like the Switch? Or maybe just stick with a powerful console and leave the handheld market to Nintendo?

#IGN #Gaming
title: PS6: The Return of the PSP? - Next-Gen Console Watch

author: IGN
description:
In this snippet from Podcast Beyond Ep 910, Jada breaks down her review of Hell is Us and why its refusal to hold your hand with the map and where to go is a definite plus to a pretty cool game.
This weeks show is Max Scoville, Jada Griffin, Brian Altano, and is produced by Nick Maillet

#gaming #hellisus #playstation
title: Hell is Us Isn't a Soulslike, But It Plays Like a FromSoft Game in Other Ways - Beyond Clips

author: IGN
description:
Both GTA6 and Hollow Knight: Silksong have prompted plenty of discussion about what devs should do when their game suddenly shares a release date with a juggernaut. 

So we asked experts about the thought process behind release dates, and what they think the right choice is when GTA 6, Silksong, or another marketing monster drops into your launch window unexpectedly.

#IGN #Silksong #GrandTheftAuto
title: Why Silksong Is 2025's GTA 6 and How Release Dates Work

author: IGN
description:
Hollow Knight Silksong gives players a lot of options for equipping Hornet with special gear. This includes crests, which not only change your combat style, but also your gear slots, meaning you can craft specific builds as you explore Pharloom. One of the first new crests you can find is the Crest of Wanderer, and this video will show you how.

Timestamps:
0:00 - Intro
0:24 - Prerequisites
1:09 - Finding the Crest of Wanderer
1:49 - Using the Crest of Wanderer

Check out our ever-expanding wiki for walkthroughs, boss guides, and much more!
https://www.ign.com/wikis/hollow-knight-silksong
title: How to Get The Crest of Wanderer in Hollow Knight: Silksong

author: IGN
description:
Hell is Us reviewed by Jada Griffin on PlayStation 5 in Quality Mode. Also available on PC and Xbox Series X/S.

Hell is Us has a blend of exploration, puzzles, and combat that, while familiar, pushes you to really pay attention to the world around you in a way that’s both compelling and occasionally frustrating. Its stark approach to quest and map tracking forces you to use your own powers of observation and take notes to solve its challenges, and the puzzles littered throughout the world kept me on my toes more than action-adventure games like this typically do. Though its lack of enemy variety and fairly straightforward combat mean the action sections don’t stack up in the same way, though there are enough tools in Remi's arsenal to at least have a good time while taking down its monsters. Hell is Us doesn't shy away from showing the dark reality of a country ravaged by war while doing so, as well as how the worst parts of humanity are, in the end, more harrowing than our most terr
title: Hell is Us Review

author: IGN
description:
IGN’s Seth Macy is exploring everything that PAX West 2025 has to offer, like collectibles, new hardware, and first looks at the hottest upcoming games like Resident Evil Requiem! Will he survive the terrifying demo? Or will he exit the CAPCOM booth forever changed?
Presented by the Army National Guard.
title: We played the Resident Evil: Requiem Demo | PAX West 2025
